snippet.title: G-Switch 4: Creator - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Test your reflexes in this ultra-fast gravity runner. Now with level editing and sharing! Join the millions who have played G-Switch, now in its latest sequel.

 - Uncover the secrets of the simulation in Story Mode, making allies along the way.
 - Create your own levels with ease in the level editor. Share your levels instantly and see how popular they become!
 - Explore an ever-growing library of thousands of levels from other players.
 - And for many, the best part of G-Switch: Gather up to 7 friends around the keyboard for lots of chaotic multiplayer fun. Can you outmaneuver them and win tournaments?

Don't stop running. At least, that's what they say...

Free mobile versions have been released!
📱 Get it on Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.seriusgames.gswitch4
📱 Download on the App Store: https://apps.apple.com/app/g-switch-4-creator/id6499483548

Also play for free now in your browser:
▶️ Play now on Poki: https://poki.com/en/g/g-switch-4
▶️ Play now on Serius Games: https://seriusgames.com/g-switch-4.html

🎨 Game Artwork by Frederico Martins ( @fredericomartins3dartist255 )

🎵 Original Soundtrack by Aleix Ramon ( @nomad_composer )
Available on Bandcamp: https://aleixramon.bandcamp.com/album/g-switch-4-creator-original-soundtrack
and Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/album/7xH5TnEQJRJ7u3J0VJVUXE?si=3L-FGTarRTyRhtca8p9YWg

💬 Discuss G-Switch on Discord: https://discord.gg/EBhcTKfder

Made in Portugal 🇵🇹
